author: The New York Times
title: Trump Jokes About “Destroying” Senator’s Career - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Trump Jokes About “Destroying” Senator’s Career By THE NEW YORK TIMES | Feb. 7, 2017 | 1:22 At a White House meeting with county sheriffs on Tuesday, President Trump joked about destroying the career of a Texas state senator, said he would take the fight on his immigration order “through the system” and slammed the news media, calling it a “very, very dishonest arm.”
